column3: @laanwj I merged; I did keep the note somewhat intact though, as it would have saved me about a week of struggling (I think).

I'd merge these into one sentence "By default, Gitian will fetch source files as needed. To cache them ahead of time, make sure you have checked out the tag you want to build in bitcoin, then:"\n\nThis saves an extra bouncing-back step :) With the wrong tag checked out it will download the dependencies for the wrong release.
